headline: Backfire! ATF has epic fail as it asks you to turn in your exes on Valentine's Day
author: WND News Services
sentences:
By Harold Hutchison
Daily Caller News Foundation
A Twitter post by the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives (ATF) calling on people to turn in exes on Valentine’s Day was slammed by congressional candidates, conservative media figures and gun rights groups Monday.

https://t.co/oPTAbUPeYH
— Sean Davis (@seanmdav) February 14, 2022
“Hi @ATFHQ — I’d like to report Barack Obama and Joe Biden who oversaw guns being run to Mexican Cartels who then used the guns to kill people,” Tennessee congressional candidate Robby Starbuck tweeted at the ATF.

We look to those who live within the communities we protect, to provide law enforcement with real time intelligence as to violent offenders,” April Langwell, chief of the ATF’s public affairs division, told the Daily Caller News Foundation in a statement.
